thread.title: Manchester resident complained about airport noise 729 times in just one year
thread.title_full: Manchester resident complained about airport noise 729 times in just one year

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Manchester resident complained about airport noise 729 times in just one year
text:
Manchester resident complained about airport noise 729 times in just one year   
Oct 15, 2015 eTN   
MANCHESTER, England - One man who lives near Manchester Airport complained 729 TIMES in just one year about noise. 
It means he logged a grievance, on average, twice a day about noisy aircraft 
His dissatisfaction took the total number of noise complaints to 1,509 in 2013/14. The previous year, there were 773. 
This year, 2014/15, there have been 860 complaints. 
For every thousand aircraft take-offs or landings, there were 4.74 complaints in 2014/15, 9.04 complaints in 2013/14 and 5.12 in the previous 12 months.
